column4: should be enough to change the driver from nvidia to nv on xorg.conf ...

well the image of the laptop is all blurry - as it was in the beginning when i set up the laptop. Something does not work properly with the nv driver. I have searched but all infos only apply to the nvidia driver with a blurry picture.
try tweaking things with "gksudo displayconfig-gtk" maybe is becouse of monitor configuration
